class.name: VisualShaderNodeVectorScalarMix
class.brief_description: Linearly interpolates between two vectors using a scalar. For use within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Translates to [code]mix(a, b, weight)[/code] in the shader language, where [code]a[/code] and [code]b[/code] are vectors and [code]weight[/code] is a scalar.
